name: AsyncStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy
desc: A strategy that handles exhaustion of a bufferâ€™s capacity.

items.name: case unbounded
items.desc: Continue to add to the buffer, without imposing a limit on the number of buffered elements.

items.name: case bufferingOldest(Int)
items.desc: When the buffer is full, discard the newly received element.

items.name: case bufferingNewest(Int)
items.desc: When the buffer is full, discard the oldest element in the buffer.
